translations: 结婚；结合（wed 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: In an increasing number, newly-weds put off having children or decide not to have one at all.
sentences.translation: 越来越多的新婚夫妇推迟生育孩子或决定不要孩子。

sentences.sentence: Armed with the right tools and materials, newly-weds gaily embark on the task of decorating their own homes.
sentences.translation: 只要配备适当的工具及材料，新婚夫妇便乐于从事新房布置。

sentences.sentence: Newly-weds Karina and Anton Bukhanovsky walked hand in hand down the main street of the regional capital of Ulyanovsk.
sentences.translation: 新婚夫妇卡丽娜和安顿•布克哈诺维斯基手牵着手走在乌里扬诺夫斯克州首府的大街上。
